articles.title: Two Giant Blobs Lurk Deep Inside Earth, And It Looks Like They're Shape-Shifters - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Deep in the Earth beneath us lie two blobs the size of continents. One is under Africa, the other under the Pacific Ocean.
articles.content:
Deep in the Earth beneath us lie two blobs the size of continents. One is under Africa, the other under the Pacific Ocean.
